## FunctionCallRequest interface

The message that is sent from the underlying sandbox to invoke a function exposed by the script host.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface FunctionCallRequest extends GenericMessage<"call"> 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [GenericMessage](./scripthost.genericmessage.md)<!-- -->&lt;"call"&gt;

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [args](./scripthost.functioncallrequest.args.md) | [ScriptValue](./scripthost.scriptvalue.md)<!-- -->\[\] | Function call arguments |
|  [correlationId](./scripthost.functioncallrequest.correlationid.md) | string | Unique identifier of the message that caused script evaluation |
|  [idempotent](./scripthost.functioncallrequest.idempotent.md) | boolean | Specifies whether the function is called from an idempotent script |
|  [key](./scripthost.functioncallrequest.key.md) | string | The function that shall be called |
